trans-unit.source: Provides a typed class that represents a compiled XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个类型化的类，表示已编译的 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: This class is returned as the result of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Compile%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类返回作为<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Compile%2A><xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>类</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的方法</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Compile%2A>的结果

trans-unit.source: It is a parameter to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Evaluate%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectSingleNode%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class.
trans-unit.target: 它是到参数<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Evaluate%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A>，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A>的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>类</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectSingleNode%2A>方法</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.SelectSingleNode%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Select%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sorts the nodes selected by the XPath expression according to the specified <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> object.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，根据指定的 XPath 表达式所选的节点进行排序<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>对象。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: The AddSort method enables users to sort objects by their data type instead of by string or number.
trans-unit.target: AddSort 方法使用户能够通过而不是其数据类型的对象进行排序的字符串或数字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> object provides an implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A> method that supports sorting on user-defined classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>对象提供的实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A>支持用户定义的类的排序的方法。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the books are sorted by ISBN number, where `isbn` is an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，丛书按 ISBN 编号，其中`isbn`是一个对象，实现<xref:System.Collections.IComparer>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: ```vb# Dim expression As XPathExpression = navigator.Compile("bookstore/book") Dim isbn As ISBN = New ISBN() expression.AddSort("@ISBN", (IComparer)isbn) ``` ```c# XPathExpression expression = navigator.Compile("bookstore/book"); ISBN isbn = new ISBN(); expression.AddSort("@ISBN", (IComparer)isbn); ``` The following are important notes to consider when using the AddSort method.
trans-unit.target: ```vb# Dim expression As XPathExpression = navigator.Compile("bookstore/book") Dim isbn As ISBN = New ISBN() expression.AddSort("@ISBN", (IComparer)isbn) ``` ```c# XPathExpression expression = navigator.Compile("bookstore/book"); ISBN isbn = new ISBN(); expression.AddSort("@ISBN", (IComparer)isbn); ```以下是使用 AddSort 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - The order in which the sorts are added provides the sort key order.
trans-unit.target: -在其中添加排序的顺序提供排序关键字的使用顺序。

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> or the sort key requires namespace resolution, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method to provide an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>或排序键需要命名空间解析，则必须使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>方法以提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>用于命名空间解析。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is the empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>不包括前缀，则假定命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 是空的命名空间。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method and provide an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>方法并提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>，其中包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object representing the sort key.
trans-unit.target: 表示排序键的对象。

trans-unit.source: This can be the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the node or an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object with a compiled XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>节点的值或<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>具有已编译的 XPath 表达式的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> object that provides the specific data type comparisons for comparing two objects for equivalence.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>提供用于比较两个对象的相等性的特定数据类型比较的对象。</xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> or sort key includes a prefix and either an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> is not provided, or the prefix cannot be found in the supplied <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>或排序关键字包括前缀，<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>未提供，或在提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>中找不到前缀</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sorts the nodes selected by the XPath expression according to the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，根据提供的参数对 XPath 表达式所选的节点进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The order in which the sorts are added provides the sort key order.
trans-unit.target: 添加排序的顺序提供排序关键字的使用顺序。

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> or the sort key requires namespace resolution, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method to provide an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>或排序键需要命名空间解析，则必须使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>方法以提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>用于命名空间解析。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is the empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>不包括前缀，则假定命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 是空的命名空间。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method and provide an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>方法并提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>，其中包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object representing the sort key.
trans-unit.target: 表示排序键的对象。

trans-unit.source: This can be the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value of the node or an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object with a compiled XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>节点的值或<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>具有已编译的 XPath 表达式的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder"></xref> value indicating the sort order.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder"> </xref>值，该值指示排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder"></xref> value indicating how to sort uppercase and lowercase letters.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder"> </xref>值，该值指示如何进行排序大写和小写字母。

trans-unit.source: The language to use for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 要用于比较的语言。

trans-unit.source: Uses the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class that can be passed to the <xref:System.String.Compare*> method for the language types, for example, "us-en" for U.S. English.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类，可以传递到<xref:System.String.Compare*>语言类型，例如，"美式英语适用于美国方法</xref:System.String.Compare*></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>英语。

trans-unit.source: If an empty string is specified, the system environment is used to determine the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定一个空字符串，用于确定<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>系统环境

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType"></xref> value indicating the sort order for the data type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType"> </xref>值，该值指示数据类型的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> or sort key includes a prefix and either an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> is not provided, or the prefix cannot be found in the supplied <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>或排序关键字包括前缀，<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>未提供，或在提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>中找不到前缀</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，返回此克隆<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, the Clone method returns a clone of this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> object with the same state as this <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> object.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，克隆方法会返回此克隆<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>具有与此相同的状态对象<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>对象。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the XPath expression specified and returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object representing the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 编译指定的 XPath 表达式并返回<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>表示 XPath 表达式的对象。

trans-unit.source: An XPath expression is evaluated to yield one of the following result types.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式进行计算以产生以下结果类型之一。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> > [!NOTE] > If a user-defined function with an invalid number of arguments (or an unimplemented user-defined function) is specified in the XPath expression, an exception occurs only at run time.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果 XPath 表达式中指定用户定义函数与无效数量的自变量 （或未实现的用户定义函数），则仅在运行时中发生异常。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>

trans-unit.source: User-defined functions are not checked at compile time and exceptions that result from user-defined functions occur only if execution evaluates the expression.
trans-unit.target: 在编译时不检查用户定义的函数和用户定义函数因异常时执行计算的表达式时，才发生。

trans-unit.source: An XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression parameter is not a valid XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式参数不是有效的 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the specified XPath expression, with the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object specified for namespace resolution, and returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object that represents the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 使用编译指定的 XPath 表达式，<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>对象指定的命名空间解析，并返回用于<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>表示 XPath 表达式的对象。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: An XPath expression is evaluated to yield one of the following result types.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式进行计算以产生以下结果类型之一。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> > [!NOTE] > If a user-defined function with an invalid number of arguments (or an unimplemented user-defined function) is specified in the XPath expression, an exception occurs only at run-time.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>- <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>1> [!NOTE]&1;> 仅在运行时在 XPath 表达式中指定与无效数量的自变量 （或未实现的用户定义函数），则如果发生异常。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType>

trans-unit.source: User-defined functions are not checked at compile time and exceptions resulting from user-defined functions occur only if execution evaluates the expression.
trans-unit.target: 在编译时不检查用户定义的函数和用户定义函数导致的异常时执行计算的表达式时，才发生。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is not possible to compile a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> with a custom context in one step by passing an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>, which implements <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>, as an argument to this method.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不能编译<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>通过传递的一个步骤中的自定义上下文<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>，该类实现<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>，作为此方法的自变量。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: To use a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> with a custom context, you must call the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> method after compiling the expression.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>与自定义上下文，必须调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>方法之后编译表达式。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: An XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> interface for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>命名空间解析的接口。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression parameter is not a valid XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式参数不是有效的 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref>表示形式<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representation of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示形式<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the result type of the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取 XPath 表达式的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType"></xref> value representing the result type of the XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType"> </xref>值，该值表示 XPath 表达式的结果类型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, specifies the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object to use for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，指定<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>对象要用于命名空间解析。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: Namespace resolution is supported using classes that implement the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> interface, such as the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用实现<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>接口，如<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>类</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager></xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>的类支持 Namespace 解析

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> stores prefix and namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) mappings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>存储前缀和命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 的映射。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to an object, such as the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> class, which implements the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> interface, and the SetContext method must be called to specify the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> interface object to use for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>需要命名空间解析，前缀和命名空间 URI 对必须添加到对象，如<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>类，该类实现<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>必须调用接口，并且 SetContext 方法以指定<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>接口对象要用于命名空间解析。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> </xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the SetContext method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 SetContext 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>不包括前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 是空的命名空间。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the SetContext method and provide an object that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，仍必须使用 SetContext 方法中，并提供一个对象，包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间中。

trans-unit.source: - You can also supply an <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> interface object for namespace resolution to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.Compile%2A> method when you create your <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> object.
trans-unit.target: -你也可以提供<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>到命名空间解析的接口对象<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.Compile%2A>方法创建时你<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>对象。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.Compile%2A> </xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: - SetContext accepts <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> as a namespace resolver, so you can implement a custom context and use functions and variables based on <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction> and <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable>.
trans-unit.target: -SetContext 接受<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>为命名空间解析程序，因此可以实现自定义上下文，并使用函数和变量基于<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction>和<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable>.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression will execute them.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式将执行它们。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [User Defined Functions and Variables](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[用户定义函数和变量](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> interface to use for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: 实现的对象<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>接口以用于命名空间解析。</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object parameter is not derived from <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>对象参数不被派生自<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> </xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, specifies the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> object to use for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>对象要用于命名空间解析。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: Namespace resolution is supported using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> class which stores prefix and namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) mappings.
trans-unit.target: 使用支持 Namespace 解析<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>存储前缀和命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 映射的类。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> requires namespace resolution, the prefix and namespace URI pair must be added to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> object and the SetContext method must be called to specify the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> object to use for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>需要命名空间解析，前缀和命名空间 URI 对必须添加到<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>必须调用对象和 SetContext 方法以指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>对象要用于命名空间解析。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the SetContext method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 SetContext 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> does not include a prefix, it is assumed that the namespace URI is the empty namespace.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>不包括前缀，则假定命名空间 URI 是空的命名空间。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>

trans-unit.source: If your XML includes a default namespace, you must still use the SetContext method and provide an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> object that contains a prefix and namespace URI to handle the default namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 包含默认命名空间，你仍必须使用 SetContext 方法并且提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>对象，其中包含的前缀和命名空间 URI 以处理默认命名空间。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: - You can also supply an <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object for namespace resolution to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.Compile%2A> method when you create your <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> object.
trans-unit.target: -你也可以提供<xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>到命名空间解析的对象<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.Compile%2A>方法创建时你<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>对象。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.Compile%2A> </xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A> accepts <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> as a namespace resolver, so you can implement a custom context and use functions and variables based on <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction> and <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable>.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>接受<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext>为命名空间解析程序，因此可以实现自定义上下文，并使用函数和变量基于<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction>和<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable>.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression.SetContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression will execute them.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式将执行它们。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [User Defined Functions and Variables](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[用户定义函数和变量](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> object to use for namespace resolution.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>对象要用于命名空间解析。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> object parameter is not derived from the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>对象参数不被派生自<xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>类。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>
